data.name: FindNanjingBranch
data.value: Nanjing Branch

data.name: FindNanjingBranchAdd
data.value: B1, No.17, Sec. 4, Nanjing E. Rd., Songshan Dist., Taipei City 105, Taiwan

data.name: FindNanjingBranchDesc1
data.value: Across from the Taipei Arena, close to the Breeze Center, Taipei Arena shopping district, and 1 minute walk from the MRT Taipei Arena Station Exit 1.

data.name: FindNanjingBranchDesc2
data.value: With more than 100 ping professional venues combined with a variety of training equipment, you can optimize your training by exercising without being restricted by venues.

data.name: FindXinyiBranch
data.value: Xinyi Branch

data.name: FindXinyiBranchAdd
data.value: Rm. 2, 2F., No.16, Sec. 5, Xinyi Rd., Xinyi Dist., Taipei City 110, Taiwan

data.name: FindXinyiBranchDesc1
data.value: Across from Taipei 101, right at the MRT Taipei 101/World Trade Center Exit 3.

data.name: FindXinyiBranchDesc2
data.value: Own a unique personal training venue that has both indoor and outdoor in Taipei City. Professional, spacious and private training space, combined with an outdoor sports lawn and PU runway, you are not limited to indoor venues. Having sports space in the outdoor area increases the diversity of training programs. Fitness not only ends with fitness, but also has better functions toward lives.

data.name: FindZhongxiaoBranchDesc1

data.name: FindZhongxiaoBranchDesc2
data.value: Rarely seen indoor high ceiling personal training venue, bright lighting space, combined with a variety of training equipment, separate bath and shower, allowing you to freshen up more comfortably.

data.name: OurTeam
data.value: Our team

data.name: JoinUsTitle
data.value: Join Us

data.name: JoinUsDesc
data.value: Founded in 2014, Beyond Fitness is devoted to developing professional one-on-one personal trainers. Beyond Fitness has established from Nanjing, Taipei Arena and has expanded Xinyi 101 and Zhongxiao Dunhua branches in five years. Behind all these, we are just a group of partners who want to let action and professional practice speak louder than words; most importantly, and those clients who have faith in us. We believe that education should be personalized and so as training. We should customize accordingly to individuals’ need that is most suitable for "people", guiding customers to live a better life.

data.name: HereWeGo
data.value: Get started

data.name: AboutVedioDesc1
data.value: Founded in 2014, Beyond Fitness is one of the largest custom training centers in Taiwan. We have more than 50 employees, providing personalized training services, corporate team health strategies, professional sports education training, corporate health consultants and more.

data.name: AboutVedioDesc2
data.value: Beyond Fitness takes exercise seriously.

data.name: AboutVedioDesc3
data.value: As professional fitness instructors, we provide training in a scientific and systematic way. We help you in a sincere manner and bring the highest benefits and value to each training course.

data.name: AboutVedioDesc4
data.value: We believe that “If we help you change your lifestyle and lead you to a healthier life, you will naturally find the value and quality of your life.”

data.name: BookNowTitle
data.value: Just four steps away!

data.name: BookNowStep1
data.value: BookDirectly via online, phone, email with our staff and get further information

data.name: BookNowStep2
data.value: ConsultYou will be carefully and thoroughly evaluated according to your conditions and needs. We assure you that the details of our trial course are clearly explained.

data.name: BookNowStep3
data.value: TrialHead to the branches you choose, there will be professional trainer taking you on one training course based on your physical condition. Meanwhile, you will not only know your physical status but also our training process and venue.

data.name: BookNowStep4
data.value: CustomizationProfessional trainers will explain the purpose of workout sessions. Your physical condition and status will be discussed with suitable advice made just for you.

data.name: Features1Desc
data.value:
Beyond Fitness commit that…

  • Customized program make training safer and meanwhile giving you significant training outcomes.
  • Professional coaches lead you to clearly understand your physical condition and training progress.
  • Enhance every step of progress by discussing the content of the course with you.
  • Review your physical condition and course content periodically. We keep the quality of training for you anytime.

data.name: Features2Desc
data.value:
Beyond Fitness owns the most six major international certificates in fitness industry, allowing you to exercise in a professional and safe environment

  • American Council on Exercise (ACE)
  • The American College of Sports Medicine (ACSM)
  • National Collegiate Athletic Association (NCAA)
  • National Strength and Conditioning Association (NSCA)
  • National Academy of Sports Medicine (NASM)
  • CrossFit
  • EXOS-XPS (The largest private athlete community in the US)
  • CPR+AED (The red cross society of the Republic of China, Taiwan)

data.name: Features3Desc
data.value:
Since Beyond Fitness established, we’ve continued to provide you with analysis during your workout and create your own physical data.

  • Fitness analysis library comprehensively analyze your exercise and physical status.
  • Class schedule and content in the Cloud, offering you a better understanding of training session.
  • Practical articles are in supply your sports and health information at any time.
  • Interesting sports & healthy Q&A, bringing you fun interactions after the workout.

data.value:
We’re happy to help,
making it easy and simple!

data.name: FAQQestion1
data.value: I want to know more about personal training courses?

data.name: FAQQestion11
data.value: Are there any trial courses?

data.name: FAQQestion12
data.value: What is the content of the course?

data.name: FAQQestion13
data.value: How to book for trial course?

data.value: How to charge?

data.name: FAQQestion21
data.value: Is monthly fee, membership fee or handling charge needed?

data.name: FAQQestion22
data.value: How to charge?

data.name: FAQQestion3
data.value: Why do we stand out?

data.name: FAQQestion4
data.value: What is the difference between a personal training course and a group training course?

data.name: FAQQestion5
data.value: Can I train by myself at Beyond Fitness?

data.name: FAQAnswer11
data.value: Yes! Book for the trial course 1-2 days beforehand, and then you’re ready to enjoy!

data.name: FAQAnswer12
data.value:
The content is as follows:
  • A careful consultation of your physical condition.
  • A careful analysis of your exercise habit and lifestyle by trainers.
  • Trainers will bring out your training goals and results, leading you to a pleasant experience.
  • Trainers are always by your side customizing your training courses.

data.name: FAQAnswer13
data.value: Find us in the following ways to start your trial course

data.name: FAQAnswer21
data.value: Beyond fitness focus on 1 on 1 customized training, you don’t need to pay any other fees.

data.name: FAQAnswer22
data.value: Customized courses are charged by the number of the courses. Prices vary depending on your goals, plans and the number of courses that you need.

data.name: FAQAnswer3
data.value: Our team is second to none in the industry. All personnel are qualified for international trainer certification (which must be within the validity period), internal professional team academic examination (every quarter, half year, one year). With scientific training as the fundamental, systematic record, analysis, we give every customer the most intimate and trustworthy service.

data.name: FAQAnswer4
data.value:
A good personal trainer will customize training programs according to client's goals, life schedule, and the status of each day, giving you the best training outcomes to while avoiding sports injuries.

The most important part is to help you make plans for those time you're not training. Compared to group training courses, personal training courses focus on each client's uniqueness and individual differentiation, customized course make the most effective training!

data.name: FAQAnswer5
data.value: Of course! We only provide customers who take training courses at Beyond fitness with registration. Your trainer will schedule and customize training session (shown as P.I. Session) for you. By that, we could control the number of people to maintain the venue, offering you the best training quality.
